transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan Ranjit sahab baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Ji haan main Ranjit Kumar Singh baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se aapka naya account manager Sabir ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji aap Ranjit sahab baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haan main Ranjit ji bol raha hun sir aapka account mujhe diya gaya hai handle karne ke liye proper tarike se. To thoda sa mujhe aapse ye discuss karna tha service ko leke to abhi sahi time hai aapse baat karne ka?
Customer: Ji ji ji ji bataiye bhaiya.
Executive: Aap batao Sabir ji kya dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Wo Nitish karke koi banda tha uska kya hua? Hello?
Executive: Nitish pura naam kya hoga sir tumhara?
Customer: Nitish Kumar.
Executive: Nitish Kumar ek minute.
Executive: Jinhone aapko service diya hai kya? Haan correct Nitish Kumar ji ne aapko service diya hua hai. Actually sir dekhiye unka jo department hai wo department sirf aur sirf jo hamari basic service hoti hai MDC aur TrustSeal wo handle karte hain. Jaise hi koi premium service leta hai Maximizer, Star, Leader to hum jo case hoti hai wo dusre department mein transfer ho jati hai. Thik hai usko handle karne ke liye. Kyunki hamare paas jitne bhi cases hai hum jo handle karte hain wo pura ka pura Maximizer, Star, Leader ke cases hum handle karte hain. To hume pata rehta hai sir kahan par kya cheez problem hoti hai kahan par kya issue aata hai sir. Isiliye jo bhi cases upgrade hoti hai. Haan boliye.
Customer: Itna bada maatha kharab hai. Bhen ke chut mein kya gaali nikal raha hai? Actually kya gaali nikal raha hai muh se bataiye. Harami paisa lene ka time mein haath jod raha tha din raat do aadmi milke humko itna pareshan kiya. Bol raha tha ye samne wale se usko gaali sunne padega kya? Hazaron dost ke roz bahana leke aata tha. Abhi jab humne payment lagwaya humko khali bas dilasa de raha hai de raha hai. Ek mahine se bataiye ek mahina ho gaya isse behtar to humko pehle wo 30,000 wala ek services nahi rehta tha 28,000 wala.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Haan actually hamare TrustSeal ka services that means humko milna chahiye na. Khali wo payment to nahi kar raha tha.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan to ab dekhiye usko jitna bhi bolta hai hum phone karke kya hua bhaiya humko business nahi mil pa raha hai. Sir aap thoda rukiye thoda rukiye humko aapko thoda intezar karna padega khali dilasa deta rehta hai. Ab humko bhaiya dilase ki zarurat nahi humko business ka zarurat hai bataiye.
Executive: Correct. Haan ji sahi bol rahe hain.
Customer: Haan. Humne hume business karna hai tabhi to jaake humne aapko ₹1,30,000 diya hai. Ab to hamara koi sage bhai to ho nahi ki aapko shadi mein daan dakshina kiya humne.
Executive: Correct aapne teen saal ka package liya sir. Main sahi bol raha hun aage.
Customer: Haan. Harami aadmi milke humko chutiya banaya na ki aisa lag raha hai humko aaj mahina bhar se isse behtar to hum humko hum ye batayega aap yakeen nahi karega bhaiya humko MDC wala jo ₹28,000 wala services nahi hota hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan aaj se jo teen saal char saal pehle hum karta tha ₹28,000 wale mein usme humko isse kaafi guna zyada humko business milta hai milta tha. Abhi dekhiye hum TrustSeal mein chal raha hai to bhaiya humko thoda bahut to kuch milna chahiye. Abhi mahina bhar mahina se upar ho gaya humko ₹1 ka dhandha nahi mil raha hai tum logo ko phone karne se tum log humko ek hi cheez bolta hai ki bhaiya aap thoda ruk jao thoda ruk jao. Dhiraj rakho hum dhiraj kya rakhega bhaiya humko dhiraj se kya matlab hai? Humko dhiraj rakhna hota to hum Bhagwan ke bharose ghar pe baith jata hum idhar aake tumko ₹1.5 lakh dene ke liye nahi aata. Maatha kharab karke rakh diya hai.
Executive: Samajh gaya sir aapka pareshani jaayaz hai main aapko nahi bolunga ki aap kahin bhi galat bol rahe ho. But sir aapko pata hoga ki aapki service jo chalu hui hai jo aapne paisa diya tha ₹1,30,000 plus GST teen saal ka wo service aapki chalu hui hai 14 November ko. Thik hai?
Customer: Bilkul. Bilkul.
Executive: 14 November ko chalu hui hai sir aaj hai 20 thik hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Abhi aapko na che din hua hai sir thik hai? Che din mein aapne jitni buylead aapne uthaya hai sir thik hai agar main dekhu aapke daily buylead ka che din mein aapne 14 se lekar kitna aapne uthaya hai? Lagbhag aapne 30-35 lead uthaya correct?
Customer: Bilkul.
Executive: Kya party log kya bol rahe hain aap batao. Mujhe aap batao main aapko har ek cheez ka problem tarike se har ek cheez bataunga sir and pareshan hone se koi business nahi hota Sabir ji ye aap bhi jante ho thik hai. Unhone service diya unka tha ki unko service aapko upgrade karna tha unhone upgrade kiya but aap pareshan hoge ki ye ho gaya wo ho gaya aisa koi business nahi niklega. IndiaMART bhi 28 saal se hai sir agar koi package aap liye ho definitely. Nahi nahi nahi hum galat kahan bol rahe hain IndiaMART ko. IndiaMART sahi hai. Main samajh gaya ki wo response aapko proper nahi kar rahe honge. Haan ye agar galat hota to hum har ek saal paisa badhata renew nahi karte band kar deta hum char saal ho gaya na hume.
Executive: Hmm char saal se aap ho.
Customer: Char nahi paanch saal ho gaya shayad. To bataiye paanch saal hum band kar.
Customer: Kharab nahi hai lekin aadmi kharab mil jata hai wahi cheez hai.
Executive: Main samajh gaya sir wo coordinate unhone package dene ke baad coordinate nahi kiye honge aapse. Main samajh gaya ki package dene ke baad wo haan.
Customer: Actually koi Naveen karke ek bhai tha matlab kya aadmi tha uska hum usko jab wo wo account manager hata raha tha un logo ka daily ek ek bar hum un logo ko phone karke bola ki ye account manager chahiye wo log bolte the ki hamara ye policy hai inko abhi tak ke liye jo payega che saat mahina ho gaya aapko change karna padega ye wo policy wagera dikha dikha ke. Bande ko hum ek bar single time call karke bolne se bole Praveen bhai humko ye ye dikkat aa raha hai aap thoda dekh ke do. Yakeen nahi manega next day se kuch na kuch humko phone call aake dhandha mil jata tha. Genuine buyer do teen to mil jata tha at least ek mil jata tha. Abhi ek mahine mein haan. Hmm wahi tha ki unhone service dene ke baad coordination proper nahi kiya isliye jaise aapka jo gussa hai wo gussa jaayaz hai ki agar wo coordinate karte har ek paisa agar aapne ₹10,000 bhi lagaye hota to definitely wo ₹10,000 ki bhi value hota sir ki haan aapne ₹10,000 bhi lagaya. Main samajh gaya aapki point. Main ye main Ranjit sahab hum aapko ye bata raha hai ki humara aaj se jo 14 che din hua hai che din se pehle humara services free mein nahi chal raha tha che din se pehle bhi humara TrustSeal chal raha tha ye to aapko behtar malum hai na.
Executive: Hmm hmm pata hai sir.
Customer: Haan. To hum last dedh se do mahine ko harami ko bol raha tha harami bas jitna bhi bar bolta tha wo apna hi gana bajana chalu kar deta tha ki bhaiya aap isme isme se usme aa jaiye isme ho jayega ho jayega ho jayega. Baad mein haath jodne lagte jodne lag jata tha ki hamara upar se pressure aa raha hai ye karo wo karo wo karo bolte bolte hum bhi chalo thik hai insaniyat ke khatir de diya paisa. Jis wajah se paisa leke jiya hai humko dhandha chahiye bhaiya mahina bhar ho gaya logo ka paisa return karne ka time aa gaya. Hmm hmm hmm. Ab humko paisa dega to kitna din ke liye dega do mahina maximum do mahina. Hmm. Baad mein to paisa mangega na aap humse. Main samajh gaya sir har ek time ka renewal aata hi hai sir us time to fir hum discuss karte hi hain to uske pehle to hume take care karna padta hai ki aapko uska pura ROI mila hai ki nahi mila hai nahi mil raha hai to kahan par dikkat aa rahi hai. At least hum at least jo humse ₹50,000 pane wala at least ₹10,000 dene se wo bolta hai chal thik hai bhai hum arrange nahi kar paye hum agle time de dega teen din ke andar mein. Kuch to ab khali haath usko phone karke bolega nahi bhaiya nahi hua hai wo mera muh thodi na dekhega. Bhai chara alag hota hai haan yaari dosti alag hota hai logo ka paisa leke koi yaari dosti nahi hota hai. Zaban ka pakka rehna chahiye. Ek cheez main puchu? Ek cheez main puchu? Puchiye. Sir kisi Mandal Luxury ko jante hain Sheela Aditya Mandal? Nahi nahi nahi wo West Bengal ka hoga. West Bengal se haan West Bengal se hain Damua se hain. Hum pata nahi bhaiya. Achcha jante nahi hain aap Assam se hain na? Haan. Aapke product line ka main do saal pehle ek client ko handle karta tha aaj bhi main ek client ko handle karta hun wo Lucknow ki party hai unko to aap nahi jante honge. Lucknow ka kya hai? Janta hun janta hun use janta hun use. Neelkanth Agro? Haan badhiya aadmi hai. Neelkanth Agro Forestry 34 35 saal ka ladka hai. Main naam bataun aapko unka naam hai Ashish Maurya aap jante hain? Janta hai dono bhai ko pehchanta hai. Lucknow ki party main naam jo bol raha hun Neelkanth Agro Forestry haan Maliabad side se hain wo log. Ab pata nahi naam dekhiye main jo handle karta hun Neelkanth Agro Forestry Ashish Maurya Maurya Maurya wo log Maurya naam hai aur dono ek Maurya bada ho gaya aur dusra dono ka business chalta hai. Achcha to kabhi aap unse ek bar feedback haan aap inse kabhi feedback lijiyega Ranjit ji kaise service dete hain thik hai main dedh saal se unki company handle kar raha hun and wo company bhi kaafi. Bhai hum log feedback thodi na puchne jayega aap humko jo sahi hai sahi kara ke do bas sahi kara ke do hume apne dhandhe se matlab hai bhai clear baat hai. Aap mujhe batao ki kya dikkat aa rahi hai sir service mein kya dikkat aa rahi hai aapne dhandha nahi dhandha nahi aa raha hai bas yahi dikkat hai aur koi dikkat nahi hai. Direct phone call nahi aa raha hai. Sir direct aapko phone call nahi aa raha hai? Nahi aa raha hai. Ek minute aapne ek do call aa raha ek do call aa raha hai wo dikhayenge to wo nahi chalega bhaiya. Nahi nahi main call haan sir main call abhi koi nahi dikha raha hun aapko mujhe bhi pata hai ki abhi to service che din live hui hai thik hai. Ek do call aa raha hai usse kuch matlab nahi hai jaise kal raat ko call aaya wo kali hal adrak ke bare mein puchne ke liye phone kiya tha hum kharidte hain ki nahi ab usko aap agar call mein counting karega to nahi chalta hai na. Main bilkul nahi count kar raha hun main ye puchna chah raha hun ki sir aapne kal ke date mein 19 November ko aapne paanch buylead uthaya tha. Aap mujhe ye bata sakte ho ki unse kya baat hui kis tarah ki baat hui? Relevant tha wo lead ki nahi tha relevant? Relevant hai relevant hai lekin wo log abhi kharidna nahi chahte ya wo log abhi vichar kar rahe hain. Ye buylead wale jo kaam hai wo zyadatar puch tach karne ke liye wo log phone karte hain jaise one time one time once upon a blue moon jis tarah hota hai achanak se koi kharid liya to kharid liya baki zyadatar log puchte rehte hain kyunki ek buylead ko kam se kam che saat aath 10 aadmi baat karta hai na. Ek buylead paanch log uthate hain. Ab dekhiye sir main aapko yahan par haan. Main sabse pehle sir dekho aapko main haan main aapko na sabse pehle yahan par solution ki baat karta hun main samajh gaya aapki jo problem aa rahi hai thik hai aap sabse pehle ek bar IndiaMART ka application open karo kis tarah aap chalate ho IndiaMART ki application ek bar aap mujhe batao thik hai? Ranjit bhai haan hello filhal to aapko filhal to aap khud se ek bar dekh lo baki hum kareeb 5:00 baje ke aas paas aapko phone milata hai haan. Sir aap na office pahunch ke ekdam mobile application mein aa jao ya jis tarah bhi aap use karte ho tab aap mere se baat karo main aapko solution karke hi dunga main aapko ghumaunga nahi koi baat upar niche nahi karunga thik hai jo cheez main bolunga aapko 4:30 baje man ke chalo hum 4:30 baje aapse baat karte hain aaram se baith ke baat karte hain. Thik hai Sabir ji 4:30 se 4:45 baje. Haan haan koi dikkat nahi hai aap mujhse ek ghanta le lo koi dikkat nahi hai but main aapko solution karke aapko main aaj ke aaj de dunga. Humko result chahiye bhaiya result chahiye clear baat hai humko result chahiye bhaiya. Sir dekhiye result agar aap bologe sir mujhe aaj ke aaj result nikal ke do to business. Aaj ke aaj nahi bol raha hai bhaiya aaj ke aaj nahi bol rahe hain hum at least do teen din mein to result dikhna mangta hai na obvious si baat hai haan obvious si baat hai sir aaj jo aap uthaoge obvious si baat hai ki usse aap kal parso tak baat karoge tab jaake chauthe paanchve din aapko lag jayega ki haan ye party meri convert hone wali hai correct but us type ki lead aani chahiye us type ka call aana chahiye usi ka solution main aapko dunga sir ki us type ke buyer aapke paas zyada se zyada aaye. Kaun sa sahi hai kaun sa galat hai wo aap bhi judge nahi kar sakta wo aapko bhi hum. Sir 110% mere se zyada experience aapka hoga aapke market mein lekin system ko kaise chalana hai kya kaise but category kaise sahi karna hai kaise lead sahi aayega uska knowledge mujhe bhi hai sir ki main kya karunga aapke catalog mein ki aapke paas sahi requirement aaye sahi inquiry aaye sir correct? Haan. Isiliye main bola ki aap 4:30 baje aap pahuncho main aapko 4:30 4:45 baje call karta hun aap mera call answer karna sir. 100% hum 4:30 baje 5:00 baje ke andar aapko call mila rahe hain. Thik hai okay sir. Okay aap thoda phone utha lena thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough business.

- Feels cheated as promises not being fulfilled.

- Expresses anger and frustration with IndiaMART's service.

- Wants TrustSeal services as promised.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged customer's frustration.

- Executive explained service activation date.

- Executive offered to provide a solution.

- Executive asked the customer to call back at 4:30 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back at 4:30 PM for resolution.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, trustseal, coordination, service
